column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Anybody who appreciates impressionism/pointilism must make sure to see "A Sunday Afternoon on the Island of Grand La Jatte" by Georges Seurat.  This piece is prominently displayed as a highlight and deservedly so.  While I have seen pictures of this painting countless times
column2: seeing it in person was simply astonishing.  The painting is far larger than I expected
